title: Chamber of Shadows - Morgue Room Tones
longDescription:
Introducing "Chamber of Shadows," a haunting collection of ambiences and room tones sourced directly from the depths of an active morgue and its chilling freezers. Designed specifically for game developers, this collection invites players to immerse themselves in an eerie and mysterious world that exists between the realms of life and death.


Explore the somber stillness of this cold and sterile environment with 21 meticulously crafted and unique tones. Each tone captures the essence of this haunting space, making it a perfect fit for creating atmospheres in haunted hospitals, asylums, or any horror or sci-fi setting that demands a chilling ambiance.


These versatile sound effects can be used individually to enhance specific moments or layered with other sounds to create complex and immersive audio landscapes. Experience the ease of integration by simply dragging and dropping the files into your game engine, and with seamless looping, the ambience will seamlessly adapt to the evolving needs of your game.


Prepare to captivate your players with the atmospheric allure of "Chamber of Shadows." Let the haunting soundscapes and chilling room tones transport your audience into the depths of an otherworldly experience.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  21 Audio Waves & Audio Cues
  •  16bit, 44.1kHz
  •  Seamless Looping
  • Mac & Windows Supported
  • 43+ Minutes
